channel.title: Jpanel anyone?
channel.description: Hey guys, I need help I am trying to make a jpanel for my pi when it starts does anyone have a code I could use?

item.title: Jpanel anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[code=java]public class GUI {
private JFrame frame = new JFrame();
private JPanel panel = new JPanel();

 public GUI() {
      frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
      frame.setSize(100, 100);
      frame.setTitle("Frame Title");
      frame.getContentPane().add(panel);
      frame.setVisible(true);
 }

}[/code]

public static void main(String[] args) { new GUI(): }

Read full topic
